DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : The purpose study compare result combine sono-guided suprascapular nerve block ( SSNB ) axillary nerve block ( ANB ) isolate SSNB postoperative pain follow arthroscopic rotator cuff repair . Our hypothesis SSNB combine ANB would show effective anesthesia arthroscopic rotator cuff repair compare SSNB . Methods : Forty-two patient rotator cuff tear undergone arthroscopic rotator cuff repair enrol study . Among , 21 patient randomly allocate group I , receive SSNB ANB 10mL ropivacaine . The 21 patient allocate group II , receive SSNB 10mL ropivacaine ANB 10mL normal saline . Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) pain score , patient 's satisfaction ( SAT ) , Lateral Pain Index ( LPI ) , etc check postoperative 1 , 3 , 6 , 12 , 18 , 24 , 36 , 48 hour .
DOC.brief_title: Axillary Nerve Block Combined With Suprascapular Nerve Block
DOC.detailed_description: All procedure describe present study approve Institutional Review Board hospital , patient give write informed consent participate present study . Between November 2012 July 2013 , forty-two patient rotator cuff tear undergone arthroscopic rotator cuff repair enrol study . Rotator cuff tear diagnose use preoperative magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) , size rotator cuff confirm time arthroscopic operation . Indication surgery symptomatic full thickness rotator cuff tear partial thickness rotator cuff 50 % thickness case fail conservative therapy . Among , 21 patient randomly allocate group I , receive suprascapular nerve block ( SSNB ) axillary nerve block ( ANB ) 10mL ropivacaine . The 21 patient allocate group II , receive SSNB 10mL ropivacaine ANB 10mL normal saline . For case study , inclusion criterion ( 1 ) definite rotator cuff tear preoperative MRI need repair , ( 2 ) accept arthroscopic surgery include rotator cuff repair , ( 3 ) 20 year old , ( 4 ) accept preemptive regional block patient control analgesia ( PCA ) . Some patient exclude follow reason ( 1 ) underwent arthroscopic rotator cuff repair ( 2 ) stop PCA postoperative 48 hour due associate side effect ( 3 ) history previous shoulder operation fracture , ( 4 ) concomitant neurologic disorder around shoulder Visual analogue scale ( VAS ) pain score , American Shoulder Elbow Surgeons ( ASES ) shoulder score , Constant score , height , weight , etc check preoperatively . All regional block preemptively perform sono-guidance . PCA set fix dose ( 0.05 ug/kg load dose 0.03ug/min.kg continuous dose , fentanyl ) remove effect variable amount PCA . VAS pain score , patient 's satisfaction ( SAT ) , percentage lateral pain affect shoulder , Lateral Pain Index ( LPI : VAS × percentage lateral pain shoulder ÷ 100 ) check postoperative 1 , 3 , 6 , 12 , 18 , 24 , 36 , 48 hour . After study , accord exclusion criterion , two patient rotator cuff tear three patient rotator cuff fray underwent arthroscopic debridement exclude study . One patient stop PCA postoperative 1 hour do , . In end , 42 patient include study . Among , 21 patient belong group I , 21 patient belong group II . All regional block preemptively perform . When patient position beach chair position , SSNB ANB perform one anesthesiologist sono-guidance . 23 gauge spinal needle use . Just skin preparation use povidone Iodine solution , thin layer sterile ultrasound transmission gel place ultrasound transducer skin . SSNB do first entry site mid point anterolateral angle acromion medial end scapular spine . With linear probe parallel scapular spine , suprascapular notch identify block perform penetrate transverse scapular ligament scapular nerve artery locate suprascapular notch . Just SSNB , ANB perform entry site point 1.5 cm medial 2cm inferior posterolateral angle acromion . With linear probe parallel longitudinal axis humerus , posterior circumflex artery identify block do artery . The color Doppler sonography may helpful identify arterial structure , sometimes undetectable , therefore could identify detect pulsatile motion . All patient study underwent arthroscopic rotator cuff repair subacromial decompression . All procedure perform one surgeon specialize shoulder elbow surgery , sport medicine . Four routine arthroscopic portal ( anterior , posterior , lateral , posterolateral ) use arthroscopic surgery . After bursectomy , arthroscopic subacromial decompression perform acromioplasty spur removal patient .
